content.text: Monstar was a little monkey that partied alongside Shanks and his crew at Partys Bar.
Monstar is a small monkey with tiny eyes. Like many monkeys, he has brown fur over most of his body, but has white fur on his stomach, face and hands.
Monstar seems to be very jolly and fun-loving, as he was partying with Shanks and his crew.
After Luffy stabbed his own eye, Monstar was seen partying with the Red Hair Pirates at Partys Bar in celebration of Luffy's craziness.

elements.text: Monstar is classified as a Type B creature, "Small Friendly".
↑  One Piece Manga — Vol. 1 Chapter 1, Monstar makes his debut.
↑  Vivre Card - One Piece Visual Dictionary (Card #16), Monstar's birthday is revealed.
↑  One Piece Blue: Grand Data File (p. 30), Monstar's name is revealed.
↑  One Piece Blue: Grand Data File (p. 88-89), classification of animals by danger.
